metadata.title: Tuesday, 25th November, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    what the total indebtedness of Konkola Copper Mines Plc as of August, 2014, was;
(b)    when the above indebtedness will be cleared; and
(c)    why the mine has not been put under liquidation.
(a)    when Mukobeko Maximum Prison was last rehabilitated;
(b)    what the state of the Prison was as of August, 2014; and
(c)    whether the Government has any plans to build another Maximum Prison.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when construction of the following, in Kalabo District, will commence
parts: (a)    VIP toilets at Chilele Primary School; and
(b)    a classroom block and VIP toilets at Yeta Community School.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when the following bridges in Chief Kakoma’s area in Mwinilunga Parliamentary Constituency will be rehabilitated

parts: (a)    how much money was owed to mining companies by the Zambia Revenue Authority in form of Value Added Tax (VAT) refunds on imported equipment as of 30th August, 2014;
(b)    when the mining companies will be paid the VAT refunds; and
(c)    whether the failure to pay VAT refunds to the mining companies on time has affected their operations.
(a)    what measures the Government will take to alleviate the suffering of the young people in the new districts of Western Province whose offers of employment were revoked; and

(b)    whether the Government has any plans to clear the unpaid emoluments for the months that the affected young people were in employment. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure):  Committee of Supply.
